MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:38am. Our engineers have arrived at Glebe Whitburn substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:28am on 26th February
